org.sakaiproject.i18n

Interface InternationalizedMessages

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Map
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ResourceLoader

    public interface InternationalizedMessages
extends Map
    InternationalizedMessages is a bundle of message implementations for many locales.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface java.util.Map

        Map.Entry<K,V>

    • Field Summary

      Fields

      static String APPLICATION_ID
      The type string for this "application": should not change over time as it may be stored in various parts of persistent entities.
      static String LOCALE_KEY
      Preferences key for user's regional language locale
